title: Personal Training
text: Personal Training is available with one of our licensed professionals on an appointment basis. Our Trainers will assess you and design a program to help you meet your personal goals and objectives. Training sessions are 55 minutes.

title: Cardio & Strength
text: Featuring machines and equipment from Life Fitness including brand new treadmills, ellipticals, recumbent bikes, lifecycles, AMTs, a Power Mill, Concept Two Rowers and Fan Bikes. Strength stations include a wide selection for a full body strength circuit workout.

title: Free Weights
text: Featuring equipment by Hammer Strength and Rogue, with adjustable benches, a smith machine, a squat rack as well as many pieces of functional fitness equipment.
